title: Move in November! Love Where You Live!
posting_body: ['Echo Ridge at North Hills', '11450 Melody Drive, Northglenn, CO, 80234', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'WELCOME TO ECHO RIDGE AT NORTH HILLS', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 730 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to Echo Ridge at North Hills in Northglenn, Colorado.', 'We are conveniently located near Denver’s light rail system, minutes away from I-25, and close to a variety of restaurants, shopping, and entertainment.', 'Our great location is guaranteed to make your life comfortable and convenient.', 'Our community offers spacious one and two bedroom floor plans with amenities fit for your everyday life.', 'Each of our homes include a washer and dryer and well-appointed kitchens.', 'Living space is increased with a balcony or patio.', 'Select homes offer fireplaces, beautiful mountain views, and walk-in closets.', 'Features', '- Air Conditioning', '- Renovated Interiors*', '- Fireplace*', '- Electric Stove', '- Views Available*', '- Balcony', '- Dishwasher', '- Refrigerator', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring*', '- Washer and Dryer in Home', 'Community Amenities', '- Business Center', '- 24-Hour Fitness Center', '- Package Acceptance', '- Clubhouse', '- TV Lounge', '- On-site Property Management', '- On-site Maintenance', '- Pet Friendly', '- Garages', '- Pool', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 't3KOfvVA']
